thread.title: New 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens' Preview
thread.title_full: New 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens' Preview

author: Bradley Hasemeyer
title: New 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens' Preview
text:
Previous Next 
A new poster for 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens' has been released showing the Dark Side and Light Side together. The List's Bradley Hasemeyer shares 3 things to look forward to before the release on December 18th. 
1. Tickets will go on sale today at 8 am. 
2. A new trailer will debut tonight during Monday Night Football on ESPN. 
3. There will be a Star Wars movie marathon in theaters on December 17th. 
What is your favorite movie from the franchise? Let us know in the comments below. 

Star Wars: The Force Awakens (also known as Star Wars Episode VII: The Force Awakens) is an upcoming American epic space opera film directed by J. J. Abrams. The seventh installment in the main Star Wars film series, it stars Harrison Ford, Mark Hamill, Carrie Fisher, Adam Driver, Daisy Ridley, John Boyega, Oscar Isaac, Lupita Nyong'o, Andy Serkis, Domhnall Gleeson, Anthony Daniels, Peter Mayhew, and Max von Sydow. The story is set approximately 30 years after the events of Return of the Jedi (1983). Copyright 2015 Scripps Media, Inc. All rights reserved.
